1311320.name: Their Radiance
1311320.description:
Their Radiance is an unconventional walking simulator about love.

In this game, you can expect to find a tale of two individuals named Rose and Maxwell who are trying to look for each other after separating after a long time. You have the ability to join them on their adventure as they make their way to each other through various environments.
1311320.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
